import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{LineChart,Line,XAxis,YAxis,Tooltip,Legend,ResponsiveContainer}from'recharts';import axios from'axios';import'./UserActivity.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserActivity=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{// Fetch user-specific activity from the backend
